Description: Unique townhouse in a highly desirable Cambridgeport location! Conveniently located in a quiet neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line, multiple bus routes, MIT and Central Square. This loft-style four story home boasts soaring ceilings, hardwood floors, exposed wood work, a decorative fire place and is flooded with natural light. You'll find two spacious bedrooms plus an office (that can be used as a 3rd bedroom) and 1.5 bathrooms with laundry in unit!. Enjoy your private outdoor oasis with a patio and garden area. The unit also features parking that can fit two small vehicles or one large vehicle. This a fully furnished rental and lease terms are flexible. All utilities are separate. Pets negotiable.
